Label.text: Tour Release not possible. There's already a Tour with status Running.
Sorry, Tour cannot be completed. One or more Calls are still open and have to be executed first.
Tour Complete not possible. One or more Documents are still open and have to be released before completing the Tour.
Tour Complete not possible. Cash Check in has to be executed first to complete the Tour.
Tour Complete not possible. Product Check in has to be executed first to complete the Tour.
Please fill in Tour Start End Date Time values.
Please fill in Tour Start Date Time values.
Please fill in Tour End Date Time values.
Visit Start Date must be earlier than End Date.
Time Thru must be greater than or equal to Time From.
Mileage Start must be greater than Zero.
Mileage End must be greater than Zero.

Date of the tour will be changed to current date now. As there might be open calls related to the tour, please use the Reschedule functionality in the tour list to move the related calls together with the tour. If you continue, the tour will be moved without rescheduling the calls.
Mileage End must be greater than Mileage Start.
The Truck Id must be entered.
The Trailor1 Id must be entered.
The Trailor2 Id must be entered.
The Vehicle OK Start must be Yes.
The Vehicle OK End must be Yes.
The truck must be ok before starting the tour or Reason Code has to be entered if truck is not ok.
The truck must be ok before completing the tour or Reason Code has to be entered if truck is not ok.
Tour can be released only if all start of day relevant tour checks are answered.
End of Day is not possible as there are still open calls which have to be executed first.
End of Day is not possible as there are still open orders/deliveries/replenishment which have to be executed first.
End of Day is not possible as there are still open inventory documents not relevant to end of day which have to be executed first.
End of Day is not possible as there are still open cash documents not relevant to end of day which have to be executed first.
End of Day is not possible as there are still open inventory and cash documents not relevant to end of day which have to be executed first.
